name: Begging
content: Say you're gonna hold my head up
告诉我 你会让我昂起头颅
Say you're gonna break my fall
告诉我 你会让我不再坠落
告诉我 你会永远陪伴着我
Baby this is all I want
宝贝 这就是我想要的全部
Are begging me to beg for you
Begging me to beg for your love

Baby this is all I want
